SessionStart.description: Load project context when Claude Code starts or resumes

hooks.description: Read SESSION_STATUS.md to understand current project state and next tasks
hooks.prompt:
Read SESSION_STATUS.md to understand the current project state, what was accomplished in the last session, and what to work on next. This file contains:
- Completed work (72 tests passing, 2 modules complete)
- Test structure and conventions
- Key decisions made
- Next steps
- File structure
- Test running commands

After reading, briefly confirm you understand the current state and what to work on next.

SessionEnd.description: Update project status when session ends

hooks.description: Update SESSION_STATUS.md with session accomplishments and next steps
hooks.prompt:
Before ending this session, please update SESSION_STATUS.md with:
1. What was accomplished this session
2. Current test results (pass/fail counts)
3. Any new files created or modules completed
4. Updated 'Next Steps' section
5. Any important decisions or notes for next session

Keep the format consistent with the existing structure.
